title: Problems after launching League
body:
Hey guys (and maybe even girls), i currently have a Windows 10 that i have been playing league on for about half a year, runs smooth until yesterday. I have had no problems with the new launcher either, until yesterday, when i tried to start the launcher, a windows error pops up, it says something about it was a problem with league or it's not made for windows 10 and a bugsplat report.

So what i did was reinstalling league. For some reason after it was installed it was using the old launcher. But that day it actually worked when i tried to start league today, when i opened the launcher and clicked launch, i got the same error as yesterday.

I also did a quick scan on windows defender in case a virus was causing the problem, but windows defender found nothing.

Anyone experiencing the same problem or having any solutions?

replies.body:
It sounds like your installation of League has some major issues. This could be for a number of reasons, but the first step is to ensure you've installed League according to our [**reinstallation guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If you have ensured the reinstall was done correctly and still experience issues, let me know.
